radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Anteroposterior and frog-leg lateral radiographs of the pelvis
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No changes in the appearance of the lesion in either hip in comparison with the pretreatment radiographs.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Smooth articular rim with no evidence of chondral irregularity.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Standing anteroposterior radiograph of the pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Subtle, irregular epiphyseal contours in the right femoral head.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Anteroposterior and frog-leg lateral pelvic radiographs, Magnetic resonance imaging
radiographic_examinations.findings: Osteochondritis dissecans lesion of the femoral head bilaterally, left lesion larger than right with likely separation from the femoral head.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in comparison with the pretreatment appearance of the lesion.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Large osteochondritis dissecans lesion in the right femoral head and a smaller lesion in the left.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Persistence of the bilateral osteochondral lesions and hip joint-space irregularity noted in follow-up radiographs.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Large osteochondral fragment separated from the underlying subchondral bone.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Hip subluxation and displacement of the osteochondral fragment observed.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral hip osteoarthritis with bilateral femoral head osteochondritis dissecans lesions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Substantial reduction of the left hip pain noted.
